channel.title: GDACS RSS information
channel.description: Near real-time alerts about natural disaster with a potential humanitarian impact

item.title: Green earthquake alert (Magnitude 5.5M, Depth:10km) in [unknown] 16/03/2024 00:14 UTC, No people affected in 100km.
item.description: On 3/16/2024 12:14:52 AM, an earthquake occurred in [unknown] potentially affecting No people affected in 100km. The earthquake had Magnitude 5.5M, Depth:10km.
item.dc:subject: EQ1

gdacs:resource.gdacs:title: Event in rss format
gdacs:resource.gdacs:description: Joint Research Center of the European Commission
gdacs:resource.gdacs:acknowledgements: Copyright European Union. Syndication allowed, provided the source is acknowledged.

item.title: Green alert for tropical cyclone MEGAN-24. Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 12 .
item.description: From 15/03/2024 to 16/03/2024, a Tropical Storm (maximum wind speed of 130 km/h) MEGAN-24 was active in NTerritory. The cyclone affects these countries: Australia (vulnerability Low). Estimated population affected by category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 12 .
item.dc:subject: TC1
item.gdacs:severity: Tropical Storm (maximum wind speed of 130 km/h)
item.gdacs:population: Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 12

item.title: Green alert for tropical cyclone EIGHTEEN-24. Population affected by Category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0 (3049 in Tropical Storm).
item.description: From 11/03/2024 to 16/03/2024, a Tropical Storm (maximum wind speed of 102 km/h) EIGHTEEN-24 was active in SEIndian. The cyclone affects these countries: Christmas Island (vulnerability Low). Estimated population affected by category 1 (120 km/h) wind speeds or higher is 0 (3049 in tropical storm).
item.dc:subject: TC1
item.gdacs:severity: Tropical Storm (maximum wind speed of 102 km/h)
